title: Vero Building Systems
summary: Built a Custom Beaver Builder Module
work: Created a custom Beaver Builder module that enhances the default slider module.
This new module allows you to set the minimum and maximum slides to display at a time, and it even supports decimal values to render a peeking slide.
The new module also includes a highlight slide feature, enabling you to set the background and text color for a specific slide to be highlighted.

title: The Sukkah Project
summary: Built a Year On Year Sales Report Dashboard
work: Created a dashboard on the backend of WordPress to display a Year on Year sales report with adjustments to the varying start and end dates of the Sukkot, a Jewish holiday, which is observed in different dates every year.
Retrieved the varying start and end dates of Sukkot on their Jewish Calendar Rest API
Implemented custom shipping options inside WooCommerce based on the location of the customer and the shipping classes of the products in their cart

title: Laura Letchinger Art
work: Implemented the "Add to List" functionality for each paintings with a heart button that animates on click
The list is shown on a collapsible sidebar where users can preview their list
All the paintings in the list can then be included in the email when users submit the inquiry form

title: K9 Divine
work: Managed most of the website from the ground up
Converted the Adobe XD designs to the pages
Used the in-house Advanced Custom Fields based page builder

title: Coworker Coffee
summary:
A startup project initiated by my colleague.
My first WordPress rodeo!
work: Created custom plugins and theme to create a platform for companies to have their employees be randomly paired once a week

Created a user dashboard that displays a calendar, using fullcalendar.js, and moment.js for their past, present and future matches, to initiate communication with their assigned pair, and an ability to select frequency of matches per month.
Created a Slack bot using their API to interact with the members and initiate their coffee "dates" with their selected coworker for the week.
Integrated Google Calendar to further enhance the scheduling and pairing

Created a dynamic pairing system in Excel VBA to visualize the pairing of the employees, to ease up the creating of the most efficient matches based on the variables like schedules, frequency, and availability of every employees
